questions.question: The hospital is _________ (600m) from here. You can borrow my bike.
questions.fullSentence: The hospital is six hundred metres from here. You can borrow my bike.
questions.questionHint: Finish the sentences with the correct answers.

questions.question: It takes _________ (20min) to go to the airport by taxi.
questions.fullSentence: It takes twenty minutes to go to the airport by taxi.
questions.questionHint: Finish the sentences with the correct answers.

questions.question: It's about _________ (5km) from the trailhead to the mountain top.
questions.fullSentence: It's about five kilometres from the trailhead to the mountain top.
questions.questionHint: Finish the sentences with the correct answers.

questions.question: It's about _________ (3km) from Tai Wai to Sha Tin. You should take a MTR.
questions.fullSentence: It's about three kilometres from Tai Wai to Sha Tin. You should take a MTR.
questions.questionHint: Finish the sentences with the correct answers.

questions.question: It takes _________ (1.5h) to go there by bus. We are going to be late.
questions.fullSentence: It takes one and a half hours to go there by bus. We are going to be late.
questions.questionHint: Finish the sentences with the correct answers.

questions.question: The coffee shop is around the corner. It takes _________.
questions.fullSentence: The coffee shop is around the corner. It takes five minutes.
questions.questionHint: Finish the sentences with the correct answers.

questions.question: It is about _________ (200m) to walk from the cinema to the bakery.
questions.fullSentence: It is about two hundred metres to walk from the cinema to the bakery.
questions.questionHint: Finish the sentences with the correct answers.

questions.question: It takes _________ (3.5h) to fly to Seoul. I am going to take a nap.
questions.fullSentence: It takes three hours thirty minutes to fly to Seoul. I am going to take a nap.
questions.questionHint: Finish the sentences with the correct answers.

questions.question: The library is about _________ (400m) from my home. I usually walk there.
questions.fullSentence: The library is about four hundred metres from my home. I usually walk there.
questions.questionHint: Finish the sentences with the correct answers.

questions.question: It takes about _________ (1h) to go from Central to Cheung Chau.
questions.fullSentence: It takes about one hour to go from Central to Cheung Chau.
questions.questionHint: Finish the sentences with the correct answers.

questions.question: When ______ the school ________ (hold) the annual science fair this year?
questions.fullSentence: When will the school hold the annual science fair this year?
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with the correct tenses.

questions.question: Mr. Tony Chan _________ (speak) at the career day event every year.
questions.fullSentence: Mr. Tony Chan speaks at the career day event every year.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with the correct tenses.

questions.question: We ___________ (have) a day trip to Tai O to watch the Chinese White Dolphins.
questions.fullSentence: We had a day trip to Tai O to watch the Chinese White Dolphins.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with the correct tenses.

questions.question: My family and I _________ (spend) three days in Macau. I'm excited.
questions.fullSentence: My family and I will spend three days in Macau. I'm excited.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with the correct tenses.

questions.question: What time ________ Tom and Joe ________ (meet) at the M+ Museum tomorrow?
questions.fullSentence: What time will Tom and Joe meet at the M+ Museum tomorrow?
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with the correct tenses.

questions.question: After five long years, Uncle Ben ___________ (return) to Hong Kong from Canada soon.
questions.fullSentence: After five long years, Uncle Ben will return to Hong Kong from Canada soon.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with the correct tenses.

questions.question: How _______ your sister ________ (celebrate) her 18th birthday? Was there a party?
questions.fullSentence: How did your sister celebrate her 18th birthday? Was there a party?
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with the correct tenses.

questions.question: How long ________ Amy's graduation ceremony _______ (last) for?
questions.fullSentence: How long will Amy's graduation ceremony last for?
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with the correct tenses.

questions.question: Mark _______ (go) to the Geo Park tomorrow to see the incredible rock columns.
questions.fullSentence: Mark will go to the Geo Park tomorrow to see the incredible rock columns.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with the correct tenses.

questions.question: ______ you ______ (take) pictures with the characters at Disneyland? I always do!
questions.fullSentence: Do you take pictures with the characters at Disneyland? I always do!
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with the correct tenses.

questions.question: I always keep a clean ____________ in my pocket in case I need to blow my nose.
questions.fullSentence: I always keep a clean handkerchief in my pocket in case I need to blow my nose.
questions.questionHint: Fill in the blanks and say complete sentences.

questions.question: The _______ examined my teeth and said I need to floss more regularly.
questions.fullSentence: The dentist examined my teeth and said I need to floss more regularly.
questions.questionHint: Fill in the blanks and say complete sentences.

questions.question: I had to stop and tie my ________ before I could continue walking.
questions.fullSentence: I had to stop and tie my shoelaces before I could continue walking.
questions.questionHint: Fill in the blanks and say complete sentences.

questions.question: All the students in my class have to wear the same school _________.
questions.fullSentence: All the students in my class have to wear the same school uniform.
questions.questionHint: Fill in the blanks and say complete sentences.

questions.question: My mom told me to trim my ____________ because they were getting too long.
questions.fullSentence: My mom told me to trim my fingernails because they were getting too long.
questions.questionHint: Fill in the blanks and say complete sentences.

questions.question: Her maid is helping her _______ the freshly washed clothes outside to dry in the sun.
questions.fullSentence: Her maid is helping her hang the freshly washed clothes outside to dry in the sun.
questions.questionHint: Fill in the blanks and say complete sentences.

questions.question: One of my ________ is to set the table for dinner every night before my family eats.
questions.fullSentence: One of my chores is to set the table for dinner every night before my family eats.
questions.questionHint: Fill in the blanks and say complete sentences.

questions.question: You should carefully read the care label on the clothes before doing the ________ .
questions.fullSentence: You should carefully read the care label on the clothes before doing the laundry.
questions.questionHint: Fill in the blanks and say complete sentences.

questions.question: Jack has learned how to ____ ______ quickly as he always stays in bed until the last minute.
questions.fullSentence: Jack has learned how to get dressed quickly as he always stays in bed until the last minute.
questions.questionHint: Fill in the blanks and say complete sentences.

questions.question: Could you please help me __________ the cuffs of my new shirt? They are a bit tricky.
questions.fullSentence: Could you please help me button the cuffs of my new shirt? They are a bit tricky.

questions.question: We made tonight's dinner _______________.
questions.fullSentence: We made tonight's dinner by ourselves.

questions.question: My little sister can button the shirt by _______________ now.
questions.fullSentence: My little sister can button the shirt by herself now.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with 'by' and the correct reflexive pronouns.

questions.question: I baked these cookies  _______________. Are they good?
questions.fullSentence: I baked these cookies by myself. Are they good?
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with 'by' and the correct reflexive pronouns.

questions.question: They designed the T-shirts  _______________ for the charity sale.
questions.fullSentence: They designed the T-shirts by themselves for the charity sale.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with 'by' and the correct reflexive pronouns.

questions.question: He followed the steps carefully and built the model plane _______________.
questions.fullSentence: He followed the steps carefully and built the model plane by himself.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with 'by' and the correct reflexive pronouns.

questions.question: Lily can take the MTR to Wan Chai ______________.
questions.fullSentence: Lily can take the MTR to Wan Chai by herself.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with 'by' and the correct reflexive pronouns.

questions.question: Chris, can you solve this 1000 pieces puzzle _______________?
questions.fullSentence: Chris, can you solve this 1000 pieces puzzle by yourself?
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with 'by' and the correct reflexive pronouns.

questions.question: The door opened _______________ because of the strong wind.
questions.fullSentence: The door opened by itself because of the strong wind.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with 'by' and the correct reflexive pronouns.

questions.question: My cat always licks its fur. It clean its body _______________.
questions.fullSentence: My cat always licks its fur. It cleans its body by itself.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with 'by' and the correct reflexive pronouns.

questions.question: John and Ken, please put the clothes back into the drawers _______________.
questions.fullSentence: John and Ken, please put the clothes back into the drawers by yourselves.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with 'by' and the correct reflexive pronouns.

questions.question: ___________________________ I woke up at 5 a.m. today because I wanted to see the sunrise.
questions.correctAnswer: Why did you wake up at 5 a.m. today?
questions.fullSentence: Why did you wake up at 5 a.m. today? I woke up at 5 a.m. today because I wanted to see the sunrise.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with 'why', 'because' and the words provided.

questions.question: Terry runs in the park every morning ________________________________. (want to be faster in races)
questions.correctAnswer: because he wants to be faster in races.
questions.fullSentence: Terry runs in the park every morning because he wants to be faster in races.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with 'why', 'because' and the words provided.

questions.correctAnswer: because they will move to Spain next year.
questions.fullSentence: Owen and Ivan are studying Spanish because they will move to Spain next year.

questions.question: ___________________________ Ally is packing her old clothes because she wants to donate them to the charity.
questions.correctAnswer: Why is Ally packing her old clothes?
questions.fullSentence: Why is Ally packing her old clothes? Ally is packing her old clothes because she wants to donate them to the charity.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with 'why', 'because' and the words provided.

questions.question: ____________________________ My mom doesn't like drinking coffee because it is bitter.
questions.correctAnswer: Why doesn't your mom like drinking coffee?
questions.fullSentence: Why doesn't your mom like drinking coffee? My mom doesn't like drinking coffee because it is bitter.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with 'why', 'because' and the words provided.

questions.question: Victor's grandparents live in the countryside ________________________________. (not like living in big city)
questions.correctAnswer: because they don't like living in big city.
questions.fullSentence: Victor's grandparents live in the countryside because they don't like living in big city.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with 'why', 'because' and the words provided.

questions.question: ___________________________ I always film everything when we hang out because I want to create vlogs like a YouTuber.
questions.correctAnswer: Why do you always film everything when we hang out?
questions.fullSentence: Why do you always film everything when we hang out? I always film everything when we hang out because I want to create vlogs like a YouTuber.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with 'why', 'because' and the words provided.

questions.question: June is busy on the phone ________________________________. (arrange details for tomorrow's birthday dinner)
questions.correctAnswer: because she is arranging details for tomorrow's birthday dinner.
questions.fullSentence: June is busy on the phone because she is arranging details for tomorrow's birthday dinner.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with 'why', 'because' and the words provided.

questions.question: They are stuck in the tunnel ________________________________ for hours. (a car crash block the route)
questions.correctAnswer: because a car crash has blocked the route for hours.
questions.fullSentence: They are stuck in the tunnel because a car crash has blocked the route for hours.

questions.question: ________________________________ I am writing an email to the MTR because they helped me when I was sick.
questions.correctAnswer: Why are you writing an email to the MTR?
questions.fullSentence: Why are you writing an email to the MTR? I am writing an email to the MTR because they helped me when I was sick.

questions.question: I ______________ not visit) a local farm in Hong Kong before.
questions.fullSentence: I have not visited a local farm in Hong Kong before.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences in the present perfect tense.

questions.question: The cows ______________ (give) birth to many little babies recently.
questions.fullSentence: The cows have given birth to many little babies recently.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences in the present perfect tense.

questions.question: Recently, Jane ______________ (move) to a new house near my neighbourhood.
questions.fullSentence: Recently, Jane has moved to a new house near my neighbourhood.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences in the present perfect tense.

questions.question: We ______________ (taste) some oranges picked by our aunt from Australia before.
questions.fullSentence: We have tasted some oranges picked by our aunt from Australia before.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences in the present perfect tense.

questions.question: My nanny ______________ (create) a new banana pancake recipe recently.
questions.fullSentence: My nanny has created a new banana pancake recipe recently.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences in the present perfect tense.

questions.question: Uncle Dan ______________ (feed) the pigs their breakfast before going out.
questions.fullSentence: Uncle Dan has fed the pigs their breakfast before going out.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences in the present perfect tense.

questions.question: The park nearby has a rope course, but Joe ______________ (play) on it before.
questions.fullSentence: The park nearby has a rope course, but Joe has not played on it before.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences in the present perfect tense.

questions.question: ______________  you ______________ (hear) about a Pumpkin Patch before?
questions.fullSentence: Have you heard about a Pumpkin Patch before?
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences in the present perfect tense.

questions.question: The farmer ______________ (plant) new seeds in the vegetable garden recently.
questions.fullSentence: The farmer has planted new seeds in the vegetable garden recently.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences in the present perfect tense.

questions.question: My dad ______________ (be) on a business trip in Europe recently. He will be back soon!
questions.fullSentence: My dad has been on a business trip in Europe recently. He will be back soon!
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences in the present perfect tense.

questions.question: ______________  you ________________  (try) making handmade soap?
questions.fullSentence: Have you ever tried making handmade soap?

questions.question: ______________  your sister  ________________  (milk) any cows before?
questions.fullSentence: Has your sister ever milked any cows before?

questions.question: Yes, my cousins __________________ (watch) the circus performance at the AIA Carnival.
questions.fullSentence: Yes, my cousins have watched the circus performance at the AIA Carnival.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with 'ever', 'never' and the correct form of the verbs.

questions.question: No, Annie __________________ (heard) about animal migration in Africa before.
questions.fullSentence: No, Annie has never heard about animal migration in Africa before.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with 'ever', 'never' and the correct form of the verbs.

questions.question: ______________ Jerry ________________ (shoot) an arrow into the bullseye?
questions.fullSentence: Has Jerry ever shot an arrow into the bullseye?

questions.question: ______________  they ________________  (ride) a horse in Mongolia?
questions.fullSentence: Have they ridden a horse in Mongolia?
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with 'ever', 'never' and the correct form of the verbs.

questions.question: I want to see the Northern Lights in real life, but I __________________ (travel) by plane.
questions.fullSentence: I want to see the Northern Lights in real life, but I have never travelled by plane.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with 'ever', 'never' and the correct form of the verbs.

questions.question: Lily __________________ (row) over the lake before. She used to be on a rowing team.
questions.fullSentence: Lily has rowed over the lake before. She used to be on a rowing team.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with 'ever', 'never' and the correct form of the verbs.

questions.question: My brother ________________ (run) in a marathon. He said he'd love to someday.
questions.fullSentence: My brother has never run in a marathon. He said he'd love to someday.
questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with 'ever', 'never' and the correct form of the verbs.

questions.question: ______________  you ________________  (visit) your grandparents in Canada before?
questions.fullSentence: Have you ever visited your grandparents in Canada before?

questions.question: You should hang your __________ to dry under sunlight.
questions.fullSentence: You should hang your washing to dry under sunlight.

questions.question: We are looking for ________ to put in our new houses.
questions.fullSentence: We are looking for furniture to put in our new houses.

questions.question: We need to ______ the floor with floor cleaner to kill bacteria.
questions.fullSentence: We need to mop the floor with floor cleaner to kill bacteria.

questions.question: You should _______ your school uniform to look neat and clean.
questions.fullSentence: You should iron your school uniform to look neat and clean.

questions.question: You should have your ______ on time to avoid stomachache.
questions.fullSentence: You should have your meals on time to avoid stomachache.

questions.question: You can buy a ______ to decorate the room and protect the floors.
questions.fullSentence: You can buy a rug to decorate the room and protect the floors.

questions.question: It's often cheaper to buy household items from a _______ store.
questions.fullSentence: It's often cheaper to buy household items from a grocery store.
questions.questionHint: Fill in the blanks and say complete sentences.

questions.question: You can order ________ food when you don't want to cook.
questions.fullSentence: You can order takeaway food when you don't want to cook.
questions.questionHint: Fill in the blanks and say complete sentences.

questions.question: It's faster and easier to ________ the floors than to sweep them.
questions.fullSentence: It's faster and easier to vacuum the floors than to sweep them.

questions.question: You should _____ your Legos _____ so they dont trip people over.
questions.fullSentence: You should put your Legos away so they dont trip people over.

questions.question: I ___________________ (read) the entire series of my favourite books. I feel bored.
questions.fullSentence: I have already read the entire series of my favourite books. I feel bored.

questions.question: We ___________________ (adopt) a new kitten from the shelter, and we call her Mimi.

questions.question: Emma and Alan  ___________________ (buy) any decoration for their brother's birthday _________.
questions.fullSentence: Emma and Alan haven't bought any decoration for their brother's birthday yet.

questions.question: My twin brothers  _______________ (learn) how to tie their shoes. They're still a little slow.
questions.fullSentence: My twin brothers have just learned how to tie their shoes. They're still a little slow.

questions.question: _____________ Lily ______________ (prepare) the speech for her graduation ______?

questions.questionHint: Complete the sentences with 'yet', 'just' or 'already' and the correct form of the verbs.

questions.question: Grandpa and grandma ___________________ (go) to the market a few minutes ago.
questions.fullSentence: Grandpa and grandma have just gone to the market a few minutes ago.

questions.questionHint: Fill in the blanks with the correct verb tense.

questions.question: When I was little, I ______ (have) a pair of shiny shoes that lit up when I walked.
questions.fullSentence: When I was little, I had a pair of shiny shoes that lit up when I walked.
questions.questionHint: Fill in the blanks with the correct verb tense.

questions.question: You should ______ (pack) some extra T-shirts because it's really hot lately.
questions.fullSentence: You should pack some extra T-shirts because it's really hot lately.
questions.questionHint: Fill in the blanks with the correct verb tense.

questions.question: She _______ (love) her bright red dress because it makes her smile.
questions.fullSentence: She loves her bright red dress because it makes her smile.
questions.questionHint: Fill in the blanks with the correct verb tense.

questions.question: He ___________ (wash) his pants twice but they still smell bad.
questions.fullSentence: He has washed his pants twice but they still smell bad.

questions.question: My friends decided to wear matching t-shirts. He has a yellow one, and me is red.
questions.fullSentence: My friends decided to wear matching t-shirts. He has a yellow one, and mine is red.
questions.questionHint: There is a mistake in each sentence. Speak the correct sentences.
